title: 62 + living Condo for rent (18 mos) 2 bed/2 bath
posting_body: Jacobs Pond Estate ~ Enjoy 62+ living in this freshly painted, partially furnished, spacious, sunny, quiet, 2 bedroom, 2 full bath, open concept, corner condominium unit.
Watch woodland birds from your cozy, private 100 sq.
Monthly rent includes heat, water, recycling and garbage removal, landscaping, snow removal and an assigned parking space.
This condo has extra wide doors for handicapped accessibility.
The laundry is located within the unit.

The community areas include: the Wellness Center (down the hall) equipped w/ fitness equipment; furnished Great Room with balcony overlooking the pond; Library w/an upright piano, book exchange, gas fireplace and large-screen TV; and Garden Level Community Room equipped w/ a full kitchen and dining area for hosting community and private celebrations.
The Community Room opens onto an expansive outdoor patio w/tables and benches for gathering while enjoying views of the pond.
Lease duration is August 1, 2022 - April 30, 2024, no extensions.
